assistant.description: Our AI assistant can help you with travel tips and cultural etiquette.
assistant.title: Need help with logistics?

hero.alt: Fusion of Spanish arches and Indian palace architecture
hero.title: Digvijay & María

pwa.subtitle: Fast access, chat, and photos always at hand.
pwa.title: Install the Wedding App

share.description: Send the link to your guests so they can install the app.
share.message: Hi! We invite you to Digvijay & María's wedding. Install our app to have all the info, itineraries, and confirm your attendance in one place: {url}
share.title: You're invited to our wedding!

Enlace.empty_desc: Events will appear here once added.
Enlace.subtitle: A journey of love uniting two cultures, two families, and two hearts.
Enlace.title: Our Union

india_tips.description: Small gestures that open big doors. Social etiquette in India is an art of respect.
india_tips.meal_alert: It's meal time! Remember the right-hand protocol.

dress.desc: Cover shoulders and knees in sacred places. A scarf (foulard) is your best ally.
dress.title: Social Dress

hand.desc: Always use your right hand for eating, giving money, or greeting. The left is considered impure.
hand.title: The Right Hand

shanti.desc: Infinite patience. Chaos is not an error; it's part of the experience. Flow with it, don't fight it.
shanti.title: Shanti Attitude

shoes.desc: Remove your shoes before entering homes, temples, and even some shops. Comfortable sandals are key.
shoes.title: Shoes Off

india_tips.title: Respect & Culture

logistics.offline_alert: Offline Mode Enabled - Critical Data Available
logistics.title: Travel Logistics

limited_roll.desc: Each guest has {max} shots. Use them wisely.
limited_roll.title: Limited Roll

upload.limit_reached_desc: You have reached the disposable camera limit
upload.upload_desc: Upload a moment from the celebration

bingo.desc: Complete your card by finding elements from Spain and India in the hall.
bingo.title: BiCultural Bingo

games.rewards_desc: Redeem your LT for prizes in the Hospitality zone

trivia.desc: How much do you know about Digvijay and María? Answer fast and win LoveTokens.
trivia.title: Royal Trivia

who_is_who.desc: Guess who is the guest behind the avatar. Only for observers!
who_is_who.title: Who is Who?

language_section.select_description: Select your preferred language for itineraries, chats, and content.
language_section.title: Language & Culture

notification_card.not_supported_desc: To receive alerts on iPhone or some browsers, you must first install the App (Add to home screen).
notification_card.title: Wedding Alerts
